text: @AmyMcGrathKY So is Moscow Mitch saying Trump knew about the coronavirus and how devastating it could be to Americans and did nothing for months b/c he was trying to save his ass from impeachment and that was more important? I believe that is what I’m reading here. This self centered SOB
